토요도담 나눔터 - 부모님과 함께 하는 체육경험토요도담 나눔터(체육) 일시 : 10.14(토) 오전 11:00~12:00 대상 : 성남시 거주 4세 ~ 8세 자녀를 둔 가정 장소 : 성남시청 3층 한누리실 도담나눔터란? 성남시건강가정지원센터는 자녀양육에 관한 실질적인 정보를 얻고, 서로 공유하며 지역사회 내 커뮤니티를 형성하기 위한 공동육아나눔터 프로그램으로 2월 ~ 11월까지 상시 운영합니다. 수요 도담나눔터와 토요 도담나눔터를 진행하고 있는데요. 수요도담나눔터는 성남시 거주 초등 저학년 자녀를 둔 가정을 대상으로 그림책 만들기 언어 프로그램을 통하여 자녀의 상상력, 창의력 향상 및 긍정적인 언어발달을 위한 부모역할 지원을 위한 프.......

entry.title: 보이는 팟캐스트 [스토리텔러들의 책수다 _ 제25회 _ "나의 아름다운 정원" ]
entry.summary: 심윤경(1972년 ~ )은 1998년부터 소설을 쓰기 시작했다. 2002년 《나의 아름다운 정원》으로 제7회 한겨레문학상을 수상하며 문단에 나왔다. 아버지는 주인공 동구에게 이렇게 이야기 한다. “살다 보면 아픔이 많지. 어려운 일을 겪다 보면 서로 섭섭한 일도 많이 생기게 되고, 그런 걸 모두 다...
entry.content:
심윤경(1972년 ~ )은 1998년부터 소설을 쓰기 시작했다. 2002년 《나의 아름다운 정원》으로 제7회 한겨레문학상을 수상하며 문단에 나왔다. 아버지는 주인공 동구에게 이렇게 이야기 한다. “살다 보면 아픔이 많지. 어려운 일을 겪다 보면 서로 섭섭한 일도 많이 생기게 되고, 그런 걸 모두 다 네가 잘 했다, 내가 잘 했다 따지면 안 되는 거야. 무조건 서로 이해해주면서 살아야 해. 그게 가족이다.” 하지만 동구는 다르게 생각한다. “그렇게 생각하면 우리는 매우 훌륭한 가족이었다. 누가 잘못했는지 제대로 따져본 적이 한 번도 없었기 때문이다. 그 결과 엄마와 할머니는 서로 원수가 되어 앓아누웠고 아버지와 나는 지금 식은 탕수육 국.......

entry.content:
문화도시 성남시는 찾아가는 콘서트도 많이 진행하고 있습니다. 이번엔 70-80세대에겐 너무나도 유명한 가수들이 야탑역 광장에서 가을밤을 아름답게 장식해 준다고 하여 찾아가 보았습니다. 성남예총에서 주최하고 성남시에서 후원하는 찾아가는 미니콘서트! 10월 18일, 성남시의 문화광장으로 자리매김을 하고 있는 야탑역광장으로 찾아가 보겠습니다. 오후 5시 30분에 시작될 미니콘서트에 미리 자리 잡고 앉아 계신분들도 꽤 보입니다. 지나던 행인들도 공연의 출연진 안내를 보고는 자리에 착석하시는 분들이 꽤 보입니다. 문화와 예술이 어우러지는 미니콘서트 성남시의 찾아가는 콘서트는 학교를 비롯해 작은공원까지 다양한 곳으로 찾아.......

entry.content:
안녕하세요~^^ 대전광역시 공식 관광블로그 먼저보슈입니다. 가을의 꽃 하면 두가지를 흔히 떠올리는데요. 하나는 산들산들 피어오르는 코스모스! 그리고 하나는 화려한 꽃을 뽐내는 국화에요. 지금 대전은 국화에 Fall in love! 지금 국화꽃축제가 한창인 대전 오월드와 유성 유림공원을 취재해오신 최옥자 기자님의 기사를 보시겠습니다 ^^! 청명한 가을 하늘은 높고 거리에 가로수들은 하나둘씩 울긋불긋 단풍이 들어가는 2017년 가을, 전국 곳곳에서 많은 축제가 열리는 계절입니다. 가을을 꽃 하면 코스모스, 구절초, 억새, 무궁화 다양한 꽃들이 있지만, 가을의 점령사 국화꽃을 빼놓을 수 없지요. 화려한 국화꽃은 색깔도 다양합니다. 또.......

entry.title: 안철수스럽다
entry.summary: 앞으로 이런 말을 만들어 써야겠습니다. 보여주는 면면이 참 한결 같이 나쁘네요. 안철수스럽다 왜 전북 김제 농민들은 안철수와 겸상을 하지 않고 등을 돌리고 따로 새참을 먹어야 했을까? 직업에 귀천이 있는 것도 아니고 국민의당 대표가 농민을 외면하는 자리를 만들어 놓고 뭘 보여주려고...
entry.content:
앞으로 이런 말을 만들어 써야겠습니다. 보여주는 면면이 참 한결 같이 나쁘네요.

안철수스럽다

왜 전북 김제 농민들은 안철수와 겸상을 하지 않고 등을 돌리고 따로 새참을 먹어야 했을까? 직업에 귀천이 있는 것도 아니고 국민의당 대표가 농민을 외면하는 자리를 만들어 놓고 뭘 보여주려고 고구마 수확현장에 갔는지 정말 답이 안나온다. pic.twitter.com/d5M8RegLNO

-- 파란을 일으켰다! (@tgs432004) September 14, 2017

entry.title: adlib 광고 JavaScript SDK

entry.content:
adlib API Key : 597830bc0cf2d81d1ff251a2


#띠배너 스크립트 #1

// 모바일웹이 아닌 PC에서 사용하는 경우 광고 노출이 제한적일 수 있습니다.
// PC에서 사용중인경우, UserAgent 를 모바일 환경으로 변경해주세요.
// 아래 스크립트를 운영중인 사이트에 삽입해주세요. // 광고뷰 로드 스크립트
<div id="banner_adlibr"></div>
// 사용할 각 플랫폼의 site id 를 입력해주세요.
<script>
var adlib_vars = {
inmobi : "inmobi site id",
naver : "naver site id",
adam : "adam site id",
cauly : "cauly site id",
tad : "tad site id",
google_ad_client : "google adsense client id",
google_ad_slot : "google adsense ad slot",
mezzo_media : "mezzo_media",
mezzo_section : "mezzo_section",
mezzo_banner : "mezzo_banner",
uplus_ios : "uplus_ios_id",
uplus_android : "uplus_android_id",
AD_ALIGN: "center" // 필요에 의해 정렬 위치를 변경할 수 있습니다. ex) center, left, right
};
</script>
<script src="http://ad.adlibr.com/smartad/mweb/load2.jsp?id=597830bc0cf2d81d1ff251a2&render=banner_adlibr&info=adlib_vars"></script>

# 오버레이형 띠배너 스크립트 #2
// 아래 스크립트를 운영중인 사이트에 삽입해주세요. // 광고뷰를 하단 고정하는 경우 스크립트 (2)
<div id="banner_adlibr"></div>
// 사용할 각 플랫폼의 site id 를 입력해주세요.
<script>

inmobi : "inmobi site id",
naver : "naver site id",
adam : "adam site id",
cauly : "cauly site id",

google_ad_client : "google adsense client id",
google_ad_slot : "google adsense ad slot",
mezzo_media : "mezzo_media",
mezzo_section : "mezzo_section",
mezzo_banner : "mezzo_banner",
uplus_ios : "uplus_ios_id",
uplus_android : "uplus_android_id",
AD_ALIGN: "center" // 필요에 의해 정렬 위치를 변경할 수 있습니다. ex) center, left, right
};
</script>
<script src="http://ad.adlibr.com/smartad/mweb/load2.jsp?id=597830bc0cf2d81d1ff251a2&render=banner_adlibr&info=adlib_vars&fixed=bottom"></script>


# 전면배너 스크립트

// 아래 스크립트를 운영중인 사이트에 삽입해주세요. // 본문을 덮는 오버레이형 전면배너
<script src="http://ad.adlibr.com/smartad/mweb/inters/load2.jsp?id=597830bc0cf2d81d1ff251a2"></script>

# POP배너 스크립트
<script>
var adlib_pop_vars = {
AD_ALIGN:"BOTTOM_RIGHT", // TOP_LEFT, TOP_RIGHT, BOTTOM_LEFT
paddingX:50,
paddingY:50,
closeBtnImg:"http://cdn1.theinertia.com/wp-content/themes/theinertia/images/close_button.png",
closeBtnSize:40,
closeBtnX:30, // X 버튼 위치조정

};
</script>

margin: 1px 0 0 5px !important; font-size: 12px !important; overflow: hidden !important; vertical-align: middle !important; float: left !important;}









Hi Sangyong,


I’m happy to announce that we have reached an agreement to be acquired by VMware.


Six years ago, we started with a simple premise -- mobile teams need better tools to understand and diagnose user experience. Over time, our capabilities expanded into the best-in-class mobile app performance monitoring platform. We took our Crash Reporting and Network Insights and applied them to user behavior. Our User Flows allow teams to analyze why behavior changes and negatively impacts user experience.


After our name change from Crittercism to Apteligent, we doubled down on the enterprise, ensuring we met the needs of mission critical and revenue critical mobile teams across all industries. Those enterprises deploying employee and consumer facing applications face an extremely complicated set of hardware, software, and connectivity challenges. Most of all, as their business becomes reliant on mobile technologies, they need visibility into how app performance impacts key business metrics.


Apteligent further reinforces VMware’s commitment to deliver the technical innovations necessary to enable the next generation Digital Workspace with analytics driven user experience, intelligence-based decision automation, and highly scalable mobile-first cross-cloud enterprise solutions.


Apteligent’s capabilities are uniquely positioned to solve these challenges. Our data unifies silos across IT, marketing, and line of business. We have the capability to model and predict how app performance impacts revenue, churn, and engagement. Apteligent’s focus on data insights and actionable, intelligent recommendations accelerates digital transformation for the enterprise.


On a personal note, this would not have been possible without our amazing team. I’d like to take some time to recognize this group of individuals that push the boundaries of big data and enterprise mobility. Thank you for being so dedicated to each other, our product, and our customers. I’d also like to thank our hundreds of enterprise customers. We will not only support you going forward, but have big plans to expand the platform in the future.


VMware is a long-time investor and partner of Apteligent and we’ve been thoroughly impressed with the AirWatch and End User Computing teams. We’re excited to continue the journey with them, and we’re looking forward to revealing the details of our integration soon.


For more information, see this blog post from VMware’s Sumit Dhawan, Senior VP and GM, End-User Computing, as well as this blog post from Shekar Ayyar, VMWare’s Executive VP, Strategy and Corporate Development.


Take care,
Andrew Levy & Robert Kwok
Co-Founders, Apteligent











© 2015 Crittercism, Inc | 760 Market Street, Suite 1100 San Francisco CA




Unsubscribe

margin: 1px 0 0 5px !important; font-size: 12px !important; overflow: hidden !important; vertical-align: middle !important; float: left !important;}

Hi Sangyong,

I’m happy to announce that we have reached an agreement to be acquired by VMware.

Six years ago, we started with a simple premise -- mobile teams need better tools to understand and diagnose user experience. Over time, our capabilities expanded into the best-in-class mobile app performance monitoring platform. We took our Crash Reporting and Network Insights and applied them to user behavior. Our User Flows allow teams to analyze why behavior changes and negatively impacts user experience.

After our name change from Crittercism to Apteligent, we doubled down on the enterprise, ensuring we met the needs of mission critical and revenue critical mobile teams across all industries. Those enterprises deploying employee and consumer facing applications face an extremely complicated set of hardware, software, and connectivity challenges. Most of all, as their business becomes reliant on mobile technologies, they need visibility into how app performance impacts key business metrics.

Apteligent further reinforces VMware’s commitment to deliver the technical innovations necessary to enable the next generation Digital Workspace with analytics driven user experience, intelligence-based decision automation, and highly scalable mobile-first cross-cloud enterprise solutions.

Apteligent’s capabilities are uniquely positioned to solve these challenges. Our data unifies silos across IT, marketing, and line of business. We have the capability to model and predict how app performance impacts revenue, churn, and engagement. Apteligent’s focus on data insights and actionable, intelligent recommendations accelerates digital transformation for the enterprise.

On a personal note, this would not have been possible without our amazing team. I’d like to take some time to recognize this group of individuals that push the boundaries of big data and enterprise mobility. Thank you for being so dedicated to each other, our product, and our customers. I’d also like to thank our hundreds of enterprise customers. We will not only support you going forward, but have big plans to expand the platform in the future.

VMware is a long-time investor and partner of Apteligent and we’ve been thoroughly impressed with the AirWatch and End User Computing teams. We’re excited to continue the journey with them, and we’re looking forward to revealing the details of our integration soon.

For more information, see this blog post from VMware’s Sumit Dhawan, Senior VP and GM,  End-User Computing, as well as this blog post from Shekar Ayyar, VMWare’s Executive VP,  Strategy and Corporate Development.

Take care,
Andrew Levy & Robert Kwok
Co-Founders, Apteligent

© 2015 Crittercism, Inc | 760 Market Street, Suite 1100 San Francisco CA

Unsubscribe

entry.summary: ---- Original Message ---- Subject: Splunk Light 6.6 Is Here Sent: May 10, 2017 4:33 AM From: "Splunk Inc." To: imyaman@netscape.net Cc: If you have trouble viewing this email, read the online version . Simplified Data Analysis, Easier Management...
entry.content:
---- Original Message ----
Subject: Splunk Light 6.6 Is Here
Sent: May 10, 2017 4:33 AM
From: "Splunk Inc."
To: imyaman@netscape.net
Cc:


If you have trouble viewing this email, read the online version .


Simplified Data Analysis, Easier Management at Scale with Splunk Enterprise 6.6

Download Now

Announcing Splunk Light 6.6
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Simplified Data Analysis and More

Dear Sangyong,

We are excited to announce that Splunk Light 6.6 is now available for download !

Splunk Light 6.6 makes it easier than ever for a wide range of users to leverage datasets, get answers and share insights.

In Splunk Light 6.6:
*Dataset explorer allows you to use a prepared dataset to create/schedule a report and export it in CSV format
*Dashboard drilldown makes it easier to build a guided dashboard navigation experience without writing any Simple XML

* Trellis layout enables you to build multiple visualizations powered by a single search to compare different segments of a dataset

Download the latest version today !

The Splunk Team

More Resources
*Read the documentation
*Splunk Light new feature release notes
* Compare Splunk Light to Splunk Enterprise and use the one that's right for you

margin: 1px 0 0 5px !important; font-size: 12px !important; overflow: hidden !important; vertical-align: middle !important; float: left !important;}

Hey there!

It's been a busy month for us at SashiDo.

After releasing our Automatic Database Backups feature last week, now we have something else to announce :)

You know that we care about your user experience and want to make it better and better, so we have decided to implement something really cool to our platform and that's Let's Encrypt.

Let's Encrypt is a free, automated, and open certificate authority (CA) that issues domain-validated security certificates. They let people and organizations around the world obtain, renew, and manage SSL/TLS certificates. 

Their certificates can be used by websites to enable secure HTTPS connections.

The key benefits of the Let’s Encrypt certificates are:

cost-free

automatic installation

trusted by all major browsers

Starting from today, every user of SashiDo can set up SSL on the custom domain name used with their app.

You will be able to activate the SSL within a few clicks of the mouse. What is more, once you enable your certificate, we will renew it every 3 months for you automatically, so will you no longer have to worry about it :)

How to use Let’s Encrypt at SashiDo:

You can activate your Let's Encrypt certificate through your app dashboard -> App Settings -> Emails & Hosting.

If you need additional information about the certificate you can refer to our blog post and of course you can always send us an email at support@sashido.io or reach us over the live chat :)

Best,
SashiDo.io team

Don't want to get emails like this? Unsubscribe

￼

I love SashiDo and "Let's Ecrypt".

margin: 1px 0 0 5px !important; font-size: 12px !important; overflow: hidden !important; vertical-align: middle !important; float: left !important;}

Hey there!

It's been a busy month for us at SashiDo.

After releasing our Automatic Database Backups feature last week, now we have something else to announce :)

You know that we care about your user experience and want to make it better and better, so we have decided to implement something really cool to our platform and that's Let's Encrypt.

Let's Encrypt is a free, automated, and open certificate authority (CA) that issues domain-validated security certificates. They let people and organizations around the world obtain, renew, and manage SSL/TLS certificates. 

Their certificates can be used by websites to enable secure HTTPS connections.

The key benefits of the Let’s Encrypt certificates are:

  • cost-free
  • automatic installation
  • trusted by all major browsers

Starting from today, every user of SashiDo can set up SSL on the custom domain name used with their app.

You will be able to activate the SSL within a few clicks of the mouse. What is more, once you enable your certificate, we will renew it every 3 months for you automatically, so will you no longer have to worry about it :)

How to use Let’s Encrypt at SashiDo:

You can activate your Let's Encrypt certificate through your app dashboard -> App Settings -> Emails & Hosting.

If you need additional information about the certificate you can refer to our blog post and of course you can always send us an email at support@sashido.io or reach us over the live chat :)

Best,
SashiDo.io team

entry.content:
EHR 정보를 모바일에 적용하는 방법, Electronic Health Record

-----Original Message-----
From: Kinvey
To: imyaman
Sent: Sun, Mar 19, 2017 10:05 pm
Subject: Sangyong - March 21st Webinar: How to Mobilize your EHR Information Quickly and Securely


Not rendering on your device? Try it in a webpage.


How to Mobilize Your EHR
Information Quickly
and Securely
Tuesday, March 21st 12:00PM ET

Click here to register for the webinar!

Hi Sangyong,

You are invited to attend our upcoming webinar, "How to Mobilize your EHR Information Quickly and Securely." The webinar begins at 12:00PM ET, Tuesday, March 21st.

Why You Should Attend:
With the adoption of electronic records, healthcare has been digitized. However, the data is too difficult to access. Join Niko Skievaski, co-founder and president of Redox (the healthcare API company), and Jikku Venkat, VP of products at Kinvey (the leading HIPAA compliant mobile development platform company), to learn how to strip away all archaic complexity and provide a familiar, modern API. Together, we enable your developers to code once and connect to all your EHR systems and transform this information into secure and engaging patient and provider app experiences - quickly.

What You'll Learn:

Why your app developers don’t need to know anything about HL7, FHIR, CDA, CCD, X12, NCPDP, DICOM, EDI to create modern app experiences.
Why you don’t need for the world to change; everything you need to innovate is already in place.
How to build apps that will scale across your enterprise and beyond.
That HIPAA compliant apps can be easy to build - you can start prototyping today.


We hope to see you there!


Register Now














Kinvey, Inc
99 Summer St

Suite 1500

Boston, MA 02110








You are receiving this message from Kinvey. If you would like to unsubscribe, you can do so here.

View our Privacy Policy.
